issue.title: [CF 77] Hybrid cooldown/buff/debuff icons
issue.body:
Is it possible to create a hybrid cooldown/buff/debuff icon for abilities like Adrenaline Rush, Hand of Gul'dan, etc.?

Basically, these are spells with a cooldown.  When used, they either give you a buff, or your target a debuff/buff.  So the icon will look like this:

When ability is ready to use:
Icon lit up, no timers.

When ability is used and buff/debuff is up:
Icon dimmed, timer for the buff/debuff shows.

When ability is used and buff/debuff fades:
Icon dimmed, timer for ability cooldown shows.  Maybe include an option to change the color/alpha slightly in this state.


> Posted by CurseForge user junbin | Imported from CurseForge issue #77 | Raw
